metadata.Title: CVE-2023-49735 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: ** UNSUPPORTED WHEN ASSIGNED **The value set as the DefaultLocaleResolver.LOCALE_KEY attribute on thesession was not validated while resolving XML definition files, leading topossible path traversal and eventually SSRF/XXE when passinguser-controlled data to this key. Passing user-controlled data to this keymay be relatively common, as it was also used like that to set the languagein the 'tiles-test' application shipped with Tiles.This issue affects Apache Tiles from version 2 onwards.NOTE: This vulnerability only affects products that are no longer supportedby the maintainer.

criterions.comment: tiles package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
